      • getNumFrames

        public static int getNumFrames(byte[] fingerprint)
        Number of frames in a fingerprint Each frame lengths 8 bytes Usually there is more than one point in each frame, so it cannot simply divide the bytes length by 8 Last 8 byte of thisFingerprint is the last frame of this wave First 2 byte of the last 8 byte is the x position of this wave, i.e. (number_of_frames-1) of this wave
        Parameters:
        fingerprint - fingerprint bytes
        Returns:
        number of frames of the fingerprint
